task: Move the pink plastic cup to the center of the table without knocking over any other cups.

subtasks.subtask: Pick up the pink plastic cup.
subtasks.subtask_reason: The pink plastic cup needs to be lifted to move it to the center of the table.
subtasks.move: Move the gripper towards the pink plastic cup and lift it off the table.
subtasks.move_reason: Lifting the pink plastic cup allows for repositioning it to the center of the table.
subtasks.issue: Potential issue: The gripper might accidentally hit the white paper cups if not carefully positioned.
subtasks.solution: Ensure the gripper is aligned correctly with the pink plastic cup before lifting it.

subtasks.subtask: Move the pink plastic cup to the center of the table.
subtasks.subtask_reason: The pink plastic cup needs to be repositioned to the center of the table without disturbing the white paper cups.
subtasks.move: Move the gripper to the center of the table and place the pink plastic cup down.
subtasks.move_reason: Placing the pink plastic cup in the center of the table completes the task.
subtasks.issue: Potential issue: The gripper might not align perfectly with the center of the table.
subtasks.solution: Adjust the gripper's position before placing the pink plastic cup to ensure it lands in the center.
